entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with a few flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 07 March 2023
